statements: SELECT * FROM ar_learning_resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_description FROM ar_learning_resources;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name FROM ar_learning_resources WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM ar_learning_resources WHERE resource_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT resource_name FROM ar_learning_resources WHERE resource_description LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT * FROM ar_learning_resources WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT resource_name, resource_description FROM ar_learning_resources WHERE resource_id > 5 ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, CASE WHEN availability_status THEN 'Available' ELSE 'Not Available' END AS availability_status_string FROM ar_learning_resources;
SELECT * FROM ar_learning_resources WHERE resource_name LIKE 'A%' OR resource_name LIKE '%B' ORDER BY resource_id;
SELECT AVG(resource_id) AS avg_resource_id, COUNT(*) AS total_resources FROM ar_learning_resources;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE location='Warehouse A' AND quantity > 10;
SELECT resource_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE resource_type='equipment';
SELECT id, resource_name, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity <= 5 ORDER BY id;
SELECT availability_status, available_date FROM availability ORDER BY available_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, resource_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20 AND location = 'warehouse';
SELECT resource_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY resource_name HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT inventory.resource_name, availability.available_date FROM inventory INNER JOIN availability ON inventory.id = availability.resource_id WHERE availability_status = 'available';
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_resources FROM inventory GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_resources DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_learning_resources;
SELECT resource_name, author_name, publication_date FROM ar_learning_resources ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, author_name FROM ar_learning_resources WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT institution_name, location, total_students FROM educational_institutions WHERE total_students > 1000;
SELECT * FROM inventory_management WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT * FROM ar_learning_resources;
SELECT resource_name, author_name, publication_date FROM ar_learning_resources WHERE availability_status = TRUE;

SELECT resource_name, institution_name, location FROM ar_learning_resources JOIN inventory_management ON ar_learning_resources.resource_id = inventory_management.resource_id JOIN educational_institutions ON inventory_management.institution_id = educational_institutions.institution_id;

SELECT institution_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM inventory_management JOIN educational_institutions ON inventory_management.institution_id = educational_institutions.institution_id GROUP BY institution_name;
SELECT * FROM educational_institutions WHERE total_students > 500 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM AR_Learning_Resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, availability FROM AR_Learning_Resources;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM Institution;
SELECT * FROM Resource_Availability WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT usage_date, usage_duration FROM Resource_Usage;
SELECT * FROM AR_Learning_Resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM AR_Learning_Resources WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT institution_name, location FROM Institution ORDER BY institution_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Resource_Availability WHERE available_quantity > 0 ORDER BY available_quantity ASC;

SELECT r.resource_name, i.institution_name, ra.available_quantity FROM AR_Learning_Resources r JOIN Resource_Availability ra ON r.resource_id = ra.resource_id JOIN Institution i ON ra.institution_id = i.institution_id;
SELECT * FROM ar_resources;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM ar_resources WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM resource_inventory ORDER BY last_inventory_update DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM resource_categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM resource_logs WHERE resource_id = 10;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM ar_resources WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM resource_inventory WHERE last_inventory_update >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT category_name FROM resource_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, resource_id, assigned_to FROM resource_assignments WHERE assigned_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM resource_logs WHERE resource_id = 101 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
